_comments.navigation: This array controls the links in the main navigation bar. The 'href' should be the path to the page, and 'label' is the text displayed for the link.
_comments.sections: This array defines the order of sections displayed on the homepage. The names must match the keys in the sectionComponents object in 'src/app/page.tsx'. Available sections: 'hero', 'promoBanner', 'products', 'services', 'testimonials'.
